My son wanted a Jock Jacket (letterman) after earning his varsity letter.  Buying the heavy wool one offered at the school store was well over $200. The cost alone was dissuading, but my son has a wool sensitivity so I looked elsewhere.  I ordered one and the main part of the jacket was made of a sweatshirt material that looked cheap so I returned and got this one. I was hopeful that my son would like it.  He loved it! The faux leather shoulder parts give it enough difference to look like a purposely different jacket not just a knockoff.  The lighter weight suits him perfectly as it can be worn more often than the heavier wool type.  We were able to get his letter attached and the embroidery done just like any other letter jacket. Son liked it so much he got one for his best friend.

This Men's Varsity Jacket is a must-have addition to any casual wardrobe earning it a 5-star rating. The workmanship is impressive, made with high-quality materials that ensure durability and comfort. It's stylish, versatile, and pairs well with different outfits. The fit is spot-on, making it look tailor-made. The jacket adds an element of chic to your casual look effortlessly. I highly recommend it for the excellent value-for-money it offers!

As the son of this person's account, I am 5'10-11 and 140 pounds, and I chose to get an XL for the more baggy and oversized look. This size fits almost perfectly; the length of the torso part of the jacket was a little longer than necessary but it did not look even borderline silly. The quality of the jacket is also extremely nice, the material is comfortable but not itchy, and it can be a protective jacket for cold weather but not too hot for only slightly chilly weather. Worth the price, get it!

This was a much better quality than I expected. Crisp colors. A trip to the craft store for the lettering and I have the custom jacket I wanted for a fraction of the price. If you are on the fence, don’t hesitate to place your order for this jacket.

评论概述: Chic Twist On A Modern Classic
评论详情: Always one to be abreast with fashion trends, COOFANDY's Men's Varsity Leather Jacket was an item I jumped at the chance of getting because the pictures are to die for! My experience with the jacket, upon receiving it myself, was filled with the following notable features and highlights:  - The overall aesthetic of this jacket is chic meets casual; this garment can be worn on a dressed up night out for an elegant dinner or pair it with jeans + a tee for a night in with friends, or a house party. Your choice!  - Maybe it's the way the jack is supposed to fit but it does fit rather large on me, especially around the front-side of my body because its quite baggy. It's not a deal-breaker though and will be handy during winter!  - Construction of the jacket is very well put together, with double-stitching that ensure the pieces of the garment will not come apart after a few wears and the material is super-soft to the touch.  I highly recommend this jacket for fashion-conscious individuals who want a staple in their closet that never goes out of style! Or, even for those people who want to purchase an affordable bomber jacket without putting a permanent dent in their wallet.
Fits perfectly and looks amazing. I love the way it fits and comfortable. Keeps me warm and very stylish

The arms are some kind of than leather. The lining inside is nice as well. It dosent have a chimical smell, not itchy. The quality over all is incredible compare to the price (about $20). Run to get one !
